Package ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers.UserController
@RequestMapping("/users") @RestController public class UserController extends Object
User Controller that implements the User-API
Author:
Faraj

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      @RequestMapping(method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<User>> getAllUsers() throws DaoException
      This method get all users from the Sql dataBase
      Returns:
      list of users from the DB. or,
      Throws:
      DaoException - if there is a error to get 'allUsers' list or not found.

    • addUser

      @RequestMapping(method=POST) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addUser(@RequestBody User user)
      This method add a new user to the DataBase.
      Parameters:
      user - : The body of the new user.
      Returns:
      a new user, or get a error message if add user is fail.

    • updateUser

      @RequestMapping(method=PUT, path="/byId/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateUser(@RequestBody User user, @PathVariable Integer id)
      This method updates the a user using his id.
      Parameters:
      user - : The updated body of the user.
      id - : key to update and save the updated user.
      Returns:
      a updated new or a error message if update user is fail.

    • getUserById

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, path="/byId/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUserById(@PathVariable Integer id) throws DaoException
      This method get the user that have this id number
      Parameters:
      id - : the key to search and get the user.
      Returns:
      the user that have this id, or
      Throws:
      DaoException - if searching for user is fail to get.

    • getUserByEmail

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, path="/byEmail/{email}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUserByEmail(@PathVariable String email) throws DaoException
      This method get the user that have this email
      Parameters:
      email - : the key to search and get the user.
      Returns:
      the user that have this email, or
      Throws:
      DaoException - if searching for user is fail to get.

    • deleteUserSoftly

      @RequestMapping(method=DELETE, path="/softly/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteUserSoftly(@PathVariable Integer id) throws DaoException
      This method do a soft delete of the a user using his id.
      Parameters:
      id - : the key to get the user from DB
      Returns:
      updated user that have a value = 1 in failed = inActive. or,
      Throws:
      DaoException - if deleting softly of user is fail.

    • deleteUserHardly

      @RequestMapping(method=DELETE, path="/hardly/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteUserHardly(@PathVariable Integer id) throws DaoException
      This method do a hard delete of the a user using his id.
      Parameters:
      id - : the key to get the user from DB
      Returns:
      a message that the delete done or not, and delete user totally from DB. or,
      Throws:
      DaoException - if deleting hardly of user is fail.

    • getEventUsers

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, path="/byEventId/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getEventUsers(@PathVariable Integer id)
      This method get all users of an event by event id
      Parameters:
      id - : the key to get the event from DB
      Returns:
      the users that have this event id.

    • getAllUsersInRangeDateEvent

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, path="/eventsRange") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllUsersInRangeDateEvent(@RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime startDate, @RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime endDate)
      This method get all user that have an event between start date and time to end date and time.
      Parameters:
      startDate - : in format of '2022-09-01T00:00'
      endDate - : also in format of '2022-09-01T00:00'
      Returns:
      all users that have events in this dateTime range. or, get a error message if searching for user is fail to get.

    • inActiveUser

      @RequestMapping(method=PUT, path="/inActive/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> inActiveUser(@PathVariable Integer userId)
      This method get all users inActive or not
      Parameters:
      userId - : the key to get the user from DB
      Returns:
      all users that inActivity

    • subscribe

      @PostMapping("/subscribe/{email}") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> subscribe(@RequestBody Subscription subscription, @PathVariable(required=false) String email)
      This method is the LogIn of user.
      Parameters:
      subscription - : the data that sent from the browser and save in Sql table.
      email - : the user email
      Returns:
      success message to login. or error message if failed.

    • unsubscribe

      @PostMapping("/unsubscribe/{email}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> unsubscribe(@RequestBody SubscriptionEndpoint subscription, @PathVariable(required=false) String email)
      This method is the LogOut of user.
      Parameters:
      subscription - : the end point from browser
      email - : the user email
      Returns:
      success message to logout. or error message if failed.

    • isSubscribed

      @PostMapping("/isSubscribed") public boolean isSubscribed(@RequestBody SubscriptionEndpoint subscription) throws DaoException
      This method check if a user is currently subscribed to push messages by checking his end point
      Parameters:
      subscription - : the end point from browser
      Returns:
      true if a user is subscribed, false if not
      Throws:
      DaoException
